text: Let's keep up the fight against measles! 💪🏼👫 Thanks to accelerated immunization efforts, we've prevented an estimated 57 million deaths between 2000-2022! 🎉🙌 Routine vaccination and mass campaigns are key to reducing global measles deaths. Let's continue supporting orgs like the Measles & Rubella Partnership to achieve #IA2030 targets! 💡� Unity in diversity! 🌎❤️
